title: The Lost time capsule
creator_contributor_role: Look At It My Way Films, production company
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/National characteristics, Australian
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Public relations
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/National characteristics, Australian
description: In the year 2088 a group of children discover a time capsule from the Bicentenary year. When opened it shows a short, musical, promotional film with the theme "Living together always", highlighting the multicultural nature of Australian society, the outdoor life, brief film excerpts from Australia's modern history, culminating in the creation of a mural by schoolchildren.
